review: Yes easy to attach and install. We are very happy with it.

review: It's awesome! It's like having cable but you only pay for the tv stick once. Plus you can save photos, play games, and so much more.

review: Awesome device lots to do with it

review: Better sound and video than roku or apple TV... And only 25 bucks!!

review: Really cool device. I plugged the usb into the televisions USB port for power.

review: Works great!! Made our "old" TV AWESOME!!

review: Had issues with it connecting and wasn't working with my NAS. Tried it with PLEX instead and it was worst. Waste of money so returned it. Unfortunately couldn't get my money back for PLEX!
